movie.title: Bobby
movie.plot: In 1968 the lives of a retired doorman, hotel manager, lounge singer, busboy, beautician and others intersect in the wake of Robert F. Kennedy's assassination at the Ambassador Hotel in Los Angeles.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 7 wins & 22 nominations.
